list.name: Visual Studio Code
list.description: is more than just a code editor, it provides the tools and extensions to compile, debug, compare, refactor, and even manage code repositories all within a highly-customised development environment. Visual Studio Code is a proprietary distribution of the open source Small Code - OSS (vscode) iconCode - OSS (vscode) project.

list.name: Bulk Crap Uninstaller (in short BCUninstaller or BCU)
list.description: is a free (as in speech and beer) bulk program uninstaller with advanced automation. It excels at removing large amounts of applications with minimal to no user input, while requiring next to no technical knowledge.

list.name: Little Registry Cleaner
list.description: is an open source program that is designed to cleanup the Microsoft Windows registry. It removes obsolete or unwanted items that build up in the registry over time in order to improve the stability and performance of your computer.

list.name: Krita
list.description: is a complete creative sketching and painting application with advanced, commercial quality features. It's open-source and available across all major desktop platforms. Krita is free on the official website and paid on Steam and Microsoft Store: the money will support Krita development.

list.name: DBeaver
list.description: is a universal Database Manager and SQL Client. DBeaver is free and open source (GPL) universal database tool for developers and database administrator.

list.name: S3 Browser
list.description: is a Windows client for Amazon S3. User Interface for Amazon S3. Allows you to manage your Amazon S3 Buckets and files with ease.

list.name: Pritunl Client
list.description: is a simple OpenVPN Client and GUI. Additional integration available when connecting to a Pritunl server.

list.name: Format Factory
list.description: is a Format Factory is a multifunctional media converter and DVD ripper.

list.name: LMMS
list.description: is a free cross-platform alternative to commercial programs like Small FL Studio iconFL Studio , which allow you to produce music with your computer. This includes the creation of melodies and beats, the synthesis and mixing of sounds, and arranging of samples. You can have fun with your MIDI-keyboard and much more; all in a user-friendly and modern interface.

list.name: Talend
list.description: leverages the open source model to make data integration available to all types of organizations, regardless of their size, level of expertise or budgetary constraints. Talend’s solutions connect to all source and target systems and they can be downloaded at no cost. Talend also offers data quality solutions, fully complementary to its data integration solutions.

list.name: Adobe Photoshop CS6 Portable
list.description: is most powerful & Adobe’s flagship image editing windows Application with amazing new features, like vector layers, Content Aware Patch/Move tool, Adaptive Wide Angle filter, Crop tool, and so much more.

list.name: Sublime Text
list.description: is a sophisticated text editor for code, html and prose - any kind of text file. You'll love the slick user interface and extraordinary features.

list.name: OWASP Zed Attack Proxy (ZAP)
list.description: is an easy to use integrated penetration testing tool for finding vulnerabilities in web applications. It is designed to be used by people with a wide range of security experience and as such is ideal for developers and functional testers who are new to penetration testing

list.name: Cryptomator
list.description: provides transparent, client-side encryption for your cloud. Protect your documents from unauthorized access. Cryptomator on the desktop is free and open source software, so you can rest assured there are no backdoors. Cryptomator for Android/iOS costs a small fee and is not open source, but it uses an open-core component that can be checked for backdoors.

list.name: OpenSCAP
list.description: is a line of standards managed by NIST. It was created to provide a standardized approach to maintaining the security of enterprise systems, such as automatically verifying the presence of patches, checking system security configuration settings, and examining systems for signs of compromise.

list.name: Lofi
list.description: is compact, taking up only 150² pixels of screen real-estate and it's resizable! You always know what's playing, but it's never in your way.

list.name: EZBlocker
list.description: is an beautifully simple ad blocker for Small Spotify iconSpotify that automatically mutes commercials.

list.name: Mockoon
list.description: is the easiest and quickest way to run mock APIs locally. No remote deployment, no account required, open source.

list.name: diagrams.net
list.description: is a free online diagram drawing application for workflow, BPM, org charts, UML, ER, network diagrams. No login or registration are required and features include the ability to save locally (including SVG), a range of stencils, .vsdx, Lucidchart and Gliffy import and real time diagram sharing.

list.name: ScreenToGif
list.description: allows you to record a selected area of your screen and save as a animated gif.

list.name: Snappy Driver Installer Origin
list.description: is a portable Windows tool to install and update device drivers. It can be used offline to install drivers where Internet isn't available. No more searching for drivers after a clean install, just let Snappy Driver Installer Origin do it's thing and your job will be done in no time. The perfect technician's tool.

list.name: VRoid Studio
list.description: is a character maker that allows users to create, in easy steps, 3D model characters which can be used in various VR/AR platforms as well as the production 3DCG animation and games.

list.name: VMagicMirror
list.description: is application for VRM avatar on Windows desktop, to move your avatar without any special devices.

list.name: VRM to Pmx Converter
list.description: converts VRoid .vrp file to MikuMikuDance .pmx file.

list.name: MikuMikuDance
list.description: allows users to import 3D models into a virtual space that can be moved and animated accordingly. The positioning of the 3D figures can be easily altered, the facial expressions can be altered (as long as the model has morphs to use), and motion data can be applied to the model to make it move.

list.name: Pmx Editor
list.description: is a dance animation program originally created in Japanese; contains a 3D mesh for models, dancers, characters, and other accessories that can be texturized and animated with the MikuMikuDance tools; used for storing different dancer models.

list.name: ZeroTier
list.description: creates virtual ethernet networks that work everywhere. Use it as a VPN alternative, for gaming, or to create a virtual office LAN that travels with you.

list.name: Sysinternals Suite
list.description: have been rolled up into a single Suite of tools. This file contains the individual troubleshooting tools and help files.

list.name: Insomnia REST Client
list.description: is a simple yet powerful REST API Client with cookie management, environment variables, code generation, and authentication for Mac, Window, and Linux.

list.name: Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL)
list.description: is primarily a tool for developers -- especially web developers and those who work on or with open source projects. This allows those who want/need to use Bash, common Linux tools (sed, awk, etc.) and many Linux-first tools (Ruby, Python, etc.) to use their toolchain on Windows.

list.name: SmartGit
list.description: is a front-end for the distributed version control system Git and runs on Windows, Mac OS X and Linux. SmartGit is intended for developers who prefer a graphical user interface over a command line client, to be even more productive with Git.

list.name: Meld
list.description: is a visual diff and merge tool. You can compare two or three files and edit them in place (diffs update dynamically). You can compare two or three folders and launch file comparisons. You can browse and view a working copy from popular version control systems such such as CVS, Subversion, Bazaar-ng and Mercurial. Written with Python and GTK.

list.name: NetSpeedMonitor
list.description: is a lightweight Network Monitoring Toolbar for your Windows Taskbar designed to be used on computers that run Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 10.

list.name: OBS Studio
list.description: is a screen-casting and live-streaming software available across multiple platforms including macOS, Windows and Linux.

list.name: Wireshark
list.description: is the world's foremost network protocol analyzer. It lets you capture and interactively browse the traffic running on a computer network. It is the de facto (and often de jure) standard across many industries and educational institutions.

list.name: RegexBuddy
list.description: is your perfect companion for working with regular expressions. Learning, creating, understanding, testing, using and saving regular expressions has never been easier.

list.name: Chocolatey
list.description: is a Machine Package Manager, somewhat like apt-get, but built with Windows in mind. It is built on top of NuGet command line and the NuGet infrastructure. In terms of updates, it allows you to update nearly everything on your machine with a few simple keystrokes.

list.name: HandBrake
list.description: is an open-source, multithreaded video transcoder – it compresses and converts digital media from one format to another. HandBrake can rip encrypted DVDs with libdvdcss (libdvdcss is installed with VLC media player on macOS, or AnyDVD/DVD 43 on Windows).

list.name: Windows Terminal
list.description: is a new, modern, feature-rich, productive terminal application for command-line users. It includes many of the features most frequently requested by the Windows command-line community including support for tabs, rich text, globalization, configurability, theming & styling, and more.

list.name: Docker Desktop
list.description: is the fastest way to containerize applications.

list.name: Kubernetes
list.description: is an open source orchestration system for Small Docker iconDocker containers.

list.name: ArgoCD
list.description: is a declarative GitOps tool built to deploy applications to Kubernetes.

list.name: GitHub CLI
list.description: Create pull requests and issues without leaving the command line. See the status of open issues and pull requests, and see what’s waiting for review. Filter issues and pull requests, and open them in your browser.

list.name: aws-cli
list.description: is a Universal Command Line Interface for Amazon Web Services.

list.name: SonarQube
list.description: is an open source quality management platform, dedicated to continuously analyze and measure source code quality, from the portfolio to the method. Static code analysis is available in the Community Edition (free / open source) for: C#, CSS, Flex, Go, HTML, Java, JavaScript, Kotlin, PHP, Python, Ruby, Scala, TypeScript, VB.NET, XML.

list.name: Android Studio
list.description: is a new Android development environment based on Small IntelliJ IDEA iconIntelliJ IDEA. Similar to Small Eclipse iconEclipse with Small Android Development Tools for Eclipse iconAndroid Development Tools for Eclipse, Android Studio provides integrated Android developer tools for development and debugging.

list.name: Godot Engine
list.description: is a fully featured, open source, MIT licensed game engine. It focuses on having great tools, and a visual oriented workflow that can export to PC, Mobile and Web platforms.

list.name: Blender
list.description: is the free open source 3D content creation suite, available for all major operating systems under the GNU General Public License.

list.name: Discord
list.description: makes it easy to talk every day and hang out more often. Best community chat.

list.name: Jupyter Notebook
list.description: is a web application that allows you to create and share documents that contain live code, equations, visualizations and explanatory text. Uses include: data cleaning and transformation, numerical simulation, statistical modeling, machine learning and much more.

list.name: RStudio
list.description: is an integrated development environment (IDE) for R. RStudio combines an intuitive user interface with powerful coding tools to help you get the most out of R (language).

list.name: Jitsi
list.description: is an audio/video and chat communicator with full encryption that supports protocols such as SIP, XMPP/Jabber, ICQ/AIM, Windows Live, Yahoo!, GTalk/Hangouts extensions, as well as OTR, ZRTP, etc.

list.name: Zoiper
list.description: is a VoIP soft client, meant to work with any IP-based communications systems and infrastructure.

list.name: BlueStacks
list.description: runs Android OS and apps on Windows PCs with instant switch between Android and Windows - no reboot is required. End consumers can now enjoy their favorite Android apps on Windows PCs.

list.name: Phoenix OS
list.description: is a personal computer operating system which is further researched and developed based on the Android platform, mainly orients to smart tablet, laptop, desktop computer and other large-screen devices. [Warning: May contain spyware!]

list.name: GlassWire
list.description: is a network security monitoring tool and analyzer that visualizes your network activity on an easy to use graph, alerts you of possible threats, manages your firewall, and more.

list.name: Glances
list.description: is a cross-platform monitoring tool which aims to present a large amount of monitoring information through a curses or Web based interface. The information dynamically adapts depending on the size of the user interface.

list.name: 7-Zip
list.description: is a file archiver with a high compression ratio.

list.name: Ventoy
list.description: is an open source tool to create bootable USB drive for ISO files. With ventoy, you don't need to format the disk again and again, you just need to copy the iso file to the USB drive and boot it.
